forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 71. Southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 89. Northwest wind around 5 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 70. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
